ArticleInfo.ArticleTitle: Pragmatism, moral responsibility or policy change: the Syrian refugee crisis and selective humanitarianism in the Turkish refugee regime

Fund.FunderName: Carnegie Trust for the Universities of Scotland

Affiliation.OrgName: Glasgow Caledonian University, Glasgow School for Business and Society

Section1.Heading: Introduction
Section1.Para: This is the text of the article.

ArticleNote.Heading: Competing interests
ArticleNote.SimplePara: The author declares no competing interests.

ArticleNote.Heading: Authors’ information
ArticleNote.SimplePara: Umut Korkut is a Reader in Politics at Glasgow School for Business and Society Glasgow Caledonian University.

Acknowledgments.Heading: Acknowledgments
Acknowledgments.SimplePara: I am indebted to the anonymous referees for their insightful comments. This work was supported by The Carnegie Trust for the University of Scotland. I also wish to thank Slavic-Eurasian Research Center, Hokkaido University for offering me the 2015/2016 foreign visiting fellowship that brought this article to conclusion.
